body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wtr(cv(hs0))))), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wtr(cv(hs1))))

body.pretty:
⊢ (hs1 ∈ { hs0 |(c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))} ↔(c0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ Tr(hs1)))
⊣ hs1 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (hs0 = hs1 →((c0 ⊆ hs0 ∧ Tr(hs0))↔(c0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ Tr(hs1))))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0,(c0 ⊆ hs1 ∧ Tr(hs1)))
